params.amount: The amount of the claimed reward.
params.bucket: The address of the bucket from which the reward is claimed.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.amount: The amount of PMX tokens withdrawn.

addPoints(string,address,uint256,uint256.details: Only callable by the Bucket contract.

params._maxStabilizationPeriodEnd: The maximum end timestamp of the stabilization period.
params._miningAmount: The amount of mining points to be added.

returns.totalPmxReward: The total amount of PMX reward in the bucket.
returns.totalPoints: The total number of mining points in the bucket.
returns.withdrawnRewards: The total amount of withdrawn rewards from the bucket.

returns._0: The amount of tokens the lender has in mining for the given bucket.

params._timestamp: The timestamp for which the information is queried.

returns.amountInMining: The amount of tokens the lender has in mining for the given bucket.
returns.currentPercent: The current percentage of rewards the lender is eligible to receive for the given bucket. Measured in WAD (1 WAD = 100%).
returns.rewardsInPMX: An object containing information about the lender's rewards in PMX for the given bucket.

params._pmx: The address of the PMX token contract.
params._primexDNS: The address of the IPrimexDNS contract.
params._registry: The address of the registry contract.
params._reinvestmentDuration: The duration for which rewards are reinvested.
params._reinvestmentRate: The rate at which rewards are reinvested.
params._traderBalanceVault: The address of the TraderBalanceVault contract.
params._treasury: The address of the treasury contract.
params._whiteBlackList: The address of the WhiteBlackList contract.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. This function can only be called by an address with the EMERGENCY_ADMIN role. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

reinvest(string,string,address,bool,uint.details: Only callable by the Bucket contract.

params._bucketFrom: The name of the source bucket.
params._bucketTo: The name of the destination bucket.
params._isBucketLaunched: A flag indicating if the destination bucket is launched.

removePoints(string,address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Bucket contract.

params._amount: The amount of mining points to be removed.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. This function can only be called by an address with the SMALL_TIMELOCK_ADMIN or MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role depending on the contract. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

updateBucketReward(string,uint256).details: Only callable by the PrimexDNS contract.

params._pmxRewardsAmount: The amount of PMX rewards to be allocated to the bucket.

withdrawPmxByAdmin(string).details: The function to withdraw PMX from a delisted bucket or a bucket where liquidity mining failed (after reinvesting period). Emits WithdrawPmxByAdmin event.

params._bucketFrom: Name of the bucket with failed liquidity mining event.

ClaimedReward(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a reward is claimed by a receiver from a specific bucket.

WithdrawPmxByAdmin(uint256).notice: Emitted when PMX tokens are withdrawn by an admin.

addPoints(string,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Adds points for a user for future reward distribution.

claimReward(string).notice: Claims the accumulated rewards for a specific bucket.

getBucketInfo(string).notice: Retrieves rewards information about a specific bucket.

getLenderAmountInMining(string,address).notice: Retrieves the amount of tokens a lender has in mining for a specific bucket.

getLenderInfo(string,address,uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a lender in a specific bucket.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initializes the contract with the specified parameters.

reinvest(string,string,address,bool,uint.notice: Moves rewards from one bucket to another.

updateBucketReward(string,uint256).notice: Updates the reward amount for a specific bucket.
